name: cl-date-time
tagline: quickly manage date-time and timestamp units within a common lisp
body:
### a simple date-time utility
instructions are here, there and everywhere.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

this utility written at @isismelting, check our homepage at [isismelting.com](http://www.isismelting.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
